content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5)

### Additional Storage (Position x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- One wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)
- One burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=33.5-37.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network connecting various parts of the factory

### Disconnected Offshore Pump (Position x=-5.5, y=26.5)
A standalone offshore pump that is not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Research prerequisites need to be met before crafting advanced items
- Automation technology must be researched before crafting Assembling Machine 1

### Complex Recipe Chain Errors
- When crafting items with complex requirements (like Lab), ensure you have:
  - All required intermediate products (electronic circuits, copper cables)
  - Appropriate production facilities for items that can't be hand-crafted (copper plates need furnaces)
  - Sufficient raw materials for all components in the recipe chain

### Production Facility Status Issues
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning
  - Ensure proper supply of raw materials to furnaces
- Boiler shows "out of fuel" warning
  - Remember to supply fuel (coal) to keep power generation running
